text:
The ~job~ workflow succeeds due to a job-level `continue-on-error`, that's why the badge for that workflow is green. The checkmark/cross next to the commit does not reflect the overall result of the workflow run, but instead shows the results of all check runs/jobs.

Maybe this view makes it clearer: <https://github.com/JuliaArrays/StaticArrays.jl/actions/runs/511174968>

The overall status is green, but some individual jobs are red

elements.text: The
job
workflow succeeds due to a job-level
continue-on-error

, that's why the badge for that workflow is green. The checkmark/cross next to the commit does not reflect the overall result of the workflow run, but instead shows the results of all check runs/jobs.

Maybe this view makes it clearer:
The overall status is green, but some individual jobs are red
